actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the exchange of certain public land in Napa and Sonoma Counties, California, for certain land within the Point Reyes National Seashore.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to provide for the exchange of specific public land in Napa and Sonoma Counties, California, for specific land within the Point Reyes National Seashore, California.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the exchange of certain public land in Napa and Sonoma Counties, California, for certain land within the Point Reyes National Seashore.
